title: Simon Leviev From ‘Tinder Swindler’ Netflix Documentary Banned from Dating Apps
sub_head: Documentary alleges he defrauded women he met on Tinder
body:
Tinder said it has banned Simon Leviev, the subject of Netflix Inc.’s documentary “The Tinder Swindler,” which alleges that he defrauded women he met on the dating app. Tinder said it has banned Simon Leviev, the subject of Netflix Inc.’s documentary “The Tinder Swindler,” which alleges that he defrauded women he met on the dating app.
“We have conducted internal investigations and can confirm Simon Leviev is no longer active on Tinder under any of his known aliases,” a Tinder spokeswoman said.
